alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Southeast Providence; Washington; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 4:23AM EST until February 23 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts between 40 and 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southeastern Massachusetts as well as central and southern Rhode Island. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 AM EST this morning. For the Wind Advisory, from 8 PM this evening to 5 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. Below temperatures may also result in areas of freezing fog and patches of black ice early this morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
